title: Not working with Seagate
comment: Great concept but can't access my seagate nas. Problem being that there are spaces in main directory names. Tried everything (%20 etc) but no luck. Would like to see a test button or navigate to folder option to overcome this problem.

title: very good
comment: thanks for the app, intuitive & well integrated however, kindly improve it so that passwords can be hidden from screen say stored in preferences. placing userids & passwords in the url compromise security in some respects (e.g. the url with userids & passwords may get captured in logs in web/ftp proxies in clear text and this is not good)
